onboard.subtitle: Let's build your professional profile to create targeted resumes for job applications
onboard.formSubtitle: We'll gather information about your background to create targeted resumes for your job applications. You can always update this information later.

errors.fixFields: Please fix the highlighted fields before continuing.

step1.title: Professional Experience
step1.experienceYearsDescription: How many years have you been working professionally? This helps us understand your career level.
step1.professionalSummaryDescription: Write a brief summary about yourself, your expertise, and what makes you unique. This will be the introduction on your resume.

step2.title: Work Experience
step2.subtitle: Add your professional work experience, internships, and relevant positions.
step2.endDatePlaceholder: MM/DD/YYYY or leave empty if current position
step2.summaryDescription: Describe your responsibilities, achievements, and impact in this role. Include metrics and specific accomplishments when possible.

step3.title: Education
step3.subtitle: Add your academic background, degrees, and certifications.
step3.summaryDescription: List relevant coursework, honors, activities, GPA (if strong), and any notable achievements.

step4.title: Skills & Expertise
step4.subtitle: List your technical skills, soft skills, tools, and technologies.
step4.skillsDescription: List your skills separated by commas. Include technical skills, soft skills, programming languages, frameworks, tools, and any other relevant expertise.
step4.skillsPlaceholder: JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, Leadership, Communication, Project Management...
